quoteFirst: On the 27th the 1st Battalion was under arms at
quoteLast: ; but having to wait to allow the whole of the supplies and all the _impedimenta_ of the army to pass over the Traktir bridge, did not themselves move until ten o’clock. They then followed, and advanced almost to Balaklava when they came up with the rest of the army; and passing it ascended the hill to the right and approached Sebastopol.
